description.p: You stalk prey in the wilds and elsewhere, protecting nature and people from destructive forces.
When you choose this subclass at 3rd level, you gain the following features.

You can call on the forces of nature to reveal the strengths and weaknesses of your prey. While a creature is marked by your Hunter's Mark, you know whether that creature has any Immunities, Resistances, or Vulnerabilities, and if it has any, you know what they are.

sheet.description: While your Hunter's Mark is on a creature, you know its Immunities, Resistances, and Vulnerabilities (if any).

description.p: You gain one of the following options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace your choice with the other option.

ul.li: Colossus Slayer. When you hit a creature with a weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it's missing any of its Hit Points. You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

Horde Breaker. Once on each of your turns when you make an attack with a weapon, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target, is within the weapon's range, and that you haven't attacked this turn.

sheet.usage: After a Short or Long Rest
sheet.description: Choose one of the following effects:

description.p: Your tenacity can wear down even the most resilient foes. When you hit a creature with a weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it's missing any of its Hit Points. You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

sheet.description: Once per turn, when you hit a creature that isn't at full HP, deal +1d8 damage.

description.p: Once on each of your turns when you make an attack with a weapon, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target, that is within the weapon's range, and that you haven't attacked this turn

sheet.description: Once per turn, after you make a weapon attack, make another attack with the same weapon vs a different creature within 5 ft of the original target and within range (not a creature you have already attacked this turn).

description.p: You gain one of the following options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace your choice with the other option.

ul.li: Escape the Horde. Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against you.
Multiattack Defense. When a creature hits you with an attack roll, that creature has Disadvantage on all other attack rolls against you this turn.

sheet.usage: After a Short or Long Rest
sheet.description: Choose one of the following effects:

description.p: Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against you.

sheet.description: Opportunity Attacks against you have Disadvantage.

description.p: When a creature hits you with an attack roll, that creature has Disadvantage on all other attack rolls against you this turn.

sheet.description: When a creature hits you, it has Disadvantage on all other attack rolls against you this turn.

description.p: Once per turn when you deal damage to a creature marked by your Hunter's Mark, you can also deal that spell's extra damage to a different creature that you can see within 30 feet of the first creature.

sheet.description: When you deal damage to your Hunter's Mark target, you can also deal the same spell's extra damage to a different creature within 30 ft of it.

description.p: Reaction. When you take damage, you can give yourself Resistance to that damage and any other damage of the same type until the end of the current turn.

sheet.description: When you take damage, gain Resistance to that damage type until end of the current turn.
